name: mailman
description: Mailman -- the GNU mailing list manager
unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab. Using deps.dev for cross-forge analysis.

readme.summary: Clear concept demonstration with basic example, but lacks comprehensive configuration documentation and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No configuration documentation (POP3 setup, Maildir paths, polling intervals, etc.) except link to external guide

common_complaints: Release management - v0.8.0 not published to RubyGems despite being developed for years
Email parsing issues - UTF-8 errors, MIME handling, Gmail body extraction problems
Environment configuration - Rails environment not loading in production
IMAP/networking errors - NoResponseError, No route to host, message loss
Missing CLI functionality - no graceful shutdown command
sentiment.summary: The mailman project shows severe abandonment with unresponsive maintainers, critical bugs remaining unfixed for years, and a missing release on RubyGems despite user requests since 2015.

concerns: No commits in over 5 years (last commit May 2020)
29 open issues with no recent activity
Zero closed issues in past 6 months
No merged PRs in past 6 months
Zero active contributors in past 6 months
maintenance.summary: This package is abandoned with no maintenance activity for over 5 years and unresolved issues accumulating.

project_metrics.description: This is the core engine for the GNU Mailing List manager.  It is part of the full [GNU Mailman 3 suite](http://docs.mailman3.org/).
